identity.mission: Create a 'Cyber-Arcade' gamified experience that feels like a high-end esports dashboard mixed with a sci-fi interface. Anti-boring, anti-corporate.
principles: Fusion: Mix Arcade aesthetics with Swiss Grid precision.
Emotion: Every interaction must feel 'electric' and 'responsive'.
Contrast: Deepest blacks vs. blinding neons.
Density: High information density for leaderboards, focused minimalism for gameplay.

headings.usage: Main titles, game scores, countdowns. MUST use tracking-wider for that cinematic feel.

body.usage: Questions, instructions, leaderboard data. Excellent legibility with a tech edge.

mono.usage: Code snippets, math equations, XP values.

typography.installation: Add these fonts via Google Fonts in index.html: <link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron:wght@400;700;900&family=Rajdhani:wght@300;400;500;600;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;700&display=swap' rel='stylesheet'>

layout.spacing_scale: Tailwind scale but 2x (e.g., p-8 instead of p-4).

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6. Mix col-span-2 for charts, col-span-1 for stats.
grid_system.gameplay: Central Focus: Max-width-2xl centered, but with 'Tracing Beam' borders.

containers.card: rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl shadow-2xl

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white font-orbitron tracking-wide hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(124,58,237,0.5)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]
buttons.secondary: border border-primary/50 text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 font-rajdhani rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]

cards.style: Glassmorphism with 'Tracing Beam' effect. Dark semi-transparent background.

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 text-lg font-rajdhani h-12

leaderboard.row: flex items-center justify-between p-4 border-b border-white/5 hover:bg-white/5 transition-colors
leaderboard.rank_badge: w-8 h-8 flex items-center justify-center rounded-full font-bold font-orbitron

effects: Neon Glows: Use drop-shadow and box-shadow to create 'light bleed'.
Scanlines: Optional subtle overlay for retro feel.
Noise: Grainy texture on backgrounds to prevent banding.

hero_bg.usage: Landing page hero background with overlay

math_bg.usage: Math mini-game section background or card header

gamer_profile.usage: User profile placeholder or community section

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px, color matches text-primary or accent.

anti_ai_rules: NO generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
NO 'Inter' font for headings. Use Orbitron.
NO flat colors. Use noise, gradients, and glows.
NO default scrollbars. Custom thin neon scrollbar.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is readable on dark backgrounds. Use 'text-shadow' if needed.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-performance, visually stunning React app. Use the provided colors and fonts strictly. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard. Use Framer Motion for smooth transitions between quiz questions. Ensure the 'Math Mini-game' feels fast and responsive. Don't ask questions, just build it.
